submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(colors)
        debug = 1
        temp = []
        for i in range(n):
            if colors[(i-1)%n] == 1-colors[i] and colors[(i+1)%n] == 1-colors[i]:
                temp.append(i)
        out = 0
        nt = len(temp)
        if nt < k-2:
            return 0
        j = k-3
        for i in range(nt):
            ii = temp[i]
            t = (ii+k-3)%n
            if temp[j] == t:
                out += 1
            j = (j+1)%nt
        return out
'''
[0,1,0,1,0]
3
[0,1,0,0,1,0,1]
6
[1,1,0,1]
4
[0,0,0,1]
4
